articles.description: The Pfizer/BioNTech and Moderna Covid-19 vaccines are effective in pregnant and lactating women, who can pass protective antibodies to newborns, according to research published Thursday in the American Journal of Obstetrics and Gynecology.
articles.title: Study says COVID-19 vaccines provide protection for pregnant and lactating women — and their newborns - KSL.com
